definition: yes (used by Emperor or ruler)/OK/to accede/to assent

sentences.english: But they can see my resume. It~s all in there.
sentences.chinese: 但是他們可以看我的羭簡歷，都在那裏呢。

sentences.english: Say forever, I do not know how to spread.
sentences.chinese: 羭說好永遠的，不知怎麼就散了。

sentences.english: Time is a great thing, can let fate displaced within Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 浛羭時間真是個偉大的東西啊，可以讓命運顛沛流離。

sentences.english: Thanks to you I am finally thinking about me.
sentences.chinese: 涐羭感謝你讓我最後爲自己着想。

sentences.english: You use your gentle eyes, killed who want to forget you.
sentences.chinese: 浛羭你用你那溫柔的眼神，殺死了我要遺忘你的我。

sentences.english: Living without an aim is like sailing without a compass.
sentences.chinese: 氕羭生活沒有目標，猶如航海沒有羅盤。

sentences.english: He does not even know I exist.
sentences.chinese: 氕羭他甚至，都不知道我的存在。

sentences.english: Love is something eternal; the aspect may change, but not the essence.
sentences.chinese: 涐羭愛是永恆的，外表可能改變，但本質永遠不變。

definition: scales on the belly of a snake, aiding locomotion/snail/to crawl
cut off the left ear of the slain
